data.comment: There are 33677 people in the crowd for today's match.
The first-half is under way at Gazprom Arena - Yekaterinburg kick-off to start the match.
The first-half is under way at Gazprom Arena - Yekaterinburg kick-off to start the match.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in St. Petersburg.
Throw-in for Yekaterinburg at Gazprom Arena.
St. Petersburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for St. Petersburg in Saint Petersburg.
In Saint Petersburg, Sardar Azmoun of St. Petersburg is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
St. Petersburg needs to be cautious. Yekaterinburg have an attacking throw-in.
Goal! Sardar Azmoun gives St. Petersburg a 1-0 lead in Saint Petersburg.
Magomed Ozdoev instrumental with a fine assist.
Vladimir Moskalev signals a free kick to St. Petersburg.
St. Petersburg push forward at Gazprom Arena and Sebastian Driussi gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Yekaterinburg defence.
Goal! Artem Dzyuba extends St. Petersburg's lead to 2-0.
That's a fine assist from Yaroslav Rakitskiy.
Goal kick for Yekaterinburg at Gazprom Arena.
Ball safe as Yekaterinburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Great finish from Sardar Azmoun to give St. Petersburg a 3-0 lead.
St. Petersburg are caught offside.
Free kick Yekaterinburg.
Yekaterinburg have a dangerous throw-in.
Artem Dzyuba (St. Petersburg) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Yekaterinburg defenders.
St. Petersburg have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Yekaterinburg.
Sardar Azmoun (St. Petersburg) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
St. Petersburg have been awarded a corner by Vladimir Moskalev.
St. Petersburg advance rapidly upfield but Vladimir Moskalev blows for offside.
Vladimir Moskalev awards Yekaterinburg a goal kick.
St. Petersburg's Sebastian Driussi misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Yekaterinburg goal kick.
Vladimir Moskalev signals a free kick to St. Petersburg in their own half.
Goal! St. Petersburg extend their lead to 4-0 through Malcom.
Great play from Douglas Santos to set up the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Saint Petersburg.
Yekaterinburg have a goal kick.
Rafal Augustyniak for Yekaterinburg drives towards goal at Gazprom Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Eric Bicfalvi of Yekaterinburg gets in a strike, but is off target.
St. Petersburg are coming forward and Artem Dzyuba gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Yekaterinburg goal kick.
Dmitri Efremov gets his shot on target but fails to score for Yekaterinburg.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Maciej Wilusz for Yekaterinburg who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In Saint Petersburg St. Petersburg's Sebastian Driussi is caught offside.
Yekaterinburg's Maciej Wilusz looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In Saint Petersburg a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Vladimir Moskalev awards St. Petersburg a goal kick.
St. Petersburg have been awarded a corner by Vladimir Moskalev.
St. Petersburg's Malcom breaks free at Gazprom Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Yekaterinburg at Gazprom Arena.
Free kick for St. Petersburg in the half of Yekaterinburg.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Saint Petersburg.
In Saint Petersburg St. Petersburg drive forward through Sebastian Driussi. His shot is on target but it's saved.
The first-half has ended.
The second-half is underway. St. Petersburg with the kick-off.
Free kick for St. Petersburg in the half of Yekaterinburg.
Denis Polyakov is replacing Maciej Wilusz for the away team.
Sergey Semak (St. Petersburg) is making a first substitution, with Leon Musaev replacing Yuri Zhirkov.
Yekaterinburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Yekaterinburg.
Can Yekaterinburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in St. Petersburg's half?
Free kick for Yekaterinburg in their own half.
St. Petersburg's Magomed Ozdoev gets in a shot on goal at Gazprom Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
St. Petersburg to take a throw-in in Yekaterinburg territory.
St. Petersburg have been awarded a corner by Vladimir Moskalev.
Dmitri Efremov (Yekaterinburg) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Rafal Augustyniak for Yekaterinburg gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Vladimir Moskalev awards St. Petersburg a goal kick.
Free kick St. Petersburg.
The away team replace Dmitri Efremov with Artem Yusupov.
St. Petersburg's Sardar Azmoun is on target but unsuccessful.
Sebastian Driussi of St. Petersburg smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to St. Petersburg.
Malcom for St. Petersburg drives towards goal at Gazprom Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
St. Petersburg have a goal kick.
St. Petersburg pushes forward through Sardar Azmoun, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to St. Petersburg.
Important block from the Yekaterinburg defence as Artem Dzyuba fires in a strike for St. Petersburg.
It's now 5-0 in Saint Petersburg as Sardar Azmoun scores for St. Petersburg.
Malcom with an assist there.
In Saint Petersburg a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Igor Kalinin (Yekaterinburg) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
St. Petersburg drives forward and Sebastian Driussi gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Yekaterinburg's Artem Yusupov gets in a shot but it is blocked by a St. Petersburg defender.
Penalty! Vladimir Moskalev points to the spot, great chance for Yekaterinburg...
Andrey Panyukov's spot-kick reduces the deficit 5-1.
Vladimir Moskalev signals a throw-in for St. Petersburg, close to Yekaterinburg's area.
Artem Shabolin is replacing Nikolay Dimitrov for Yekaterinburg at Gazprom Arena.
Free kick for Yekaterinburg in their own half.
Vladimir Moskalev signals a free kick to Yekaterinburg in their own half.
Goal! St. Petersburg extend their lead to 6-1 through Sebastian Driussi.
Sardar Azmoun with an assist there.
St. Petersburg have been awarded a corner by Vladimir Moskalev.
St. Petersburg have been given a penalty at Gazprom Arena...
Goal! Artem Dzyuba extends St. Petersburg's lead to 7-1.
St. Petersburg make their second substitution with Daniil Shamkin replacing Magomed Ozdoev.
Vladimir Moskalev signals a St. Petersburg throw-in in Yekaterinburg's half.
Yekaterinburg have been awarded a corner by Vladimir Moskalev.
St. Petersburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Vladimir Moskalev signals a free kick to Yekaterinburg in their own half.
Leon Musaev (St. Petersburg) has received a first yellow card.
Free kick for Yekaterinburg in their own half.
St. Petersburg's Sebastian Driussi gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Yekaterinburg at Gazprom Arena.
Throw-in for St. Petersburg in the half of Yekaterinburg.
Vladimir Moskalev signals a free kick to St. Petersburg.
Yekaterinburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sergey Semak is making the team's third substitution at Gazprom Arena with Daler Kuzyaev replacing Yaroslav Rakitskiy.
St. Petersburg pushes forward through Malcom, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to St. Petersburg.
Artem Dzyuba (St. Petersburg) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In Saint Petersburg Yekaterinburg drive forward through Andrey Egorychev. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Yekaterinburg have been awarded a corner by Vladimir Moskalev.
St. Petersburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Andrey Lunev.
Vladimir Moskalev blows against St. Petersburg's Artem Dzyuba for offside.
Andrey Lunev for St. Petersburg is back on the field again.
Throw-in for St. Petersburg in their own half.
Free kick in a good position for St. Petersburg!
Corner awarded to St. Petersburg.
St. Petersburg's Sardar Azmoun is whistled for offside at Gazprom Arena.
Yekaterinburg have been awarded a corner by Vladimir Moskalev.
Vladimir Moskalev signals a free kick to St. Petersburg in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Saint Petersburg.
St. Petersburg are in shooting range from this free kick.
Vladimir Moskalev will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
St. Petersburg surge into the attack at Gazprom Arena but Artem Dzyubaâ€™s header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Yekaterinburg goal kick.
In Saint Petersburg a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Eric Bicfalvi (Yekaterinburg) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
[47] of [48] smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Full-time! The final score is 7-1.
